name: Emoji Story: The Video Game
description:
An action-packed game with romance, tension and unnecessary drama! Multiple stories to play through, all based on the  Emoji Story short film.

You may need to enter fullscreen to play

More stories may be added!

music:

Late Night Radio by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7613-late-night-radio
